1.0.name: wordpress/flickr-photos
1.0.description:
BumpIn Flickr photos plugin allows you to show your photo albums from flickr on your blog/site. The plugin shows your photos in an infinite 3D Wall with elegant and easy to use zoom and scroll options. It adds rich content on your site and enhances its features without taking up any real estate.

Following is the list of features of the plugin.

Add rich content on your site

Increase time spent by the visitors on your site

Reduce your site's bounce rate
